body: {"project":"TAMU Datathon","lessons":[{"name":"Data Management","image":"https://drive.google.com/uc?export=download&id=10_FqwgamTQcvn6ACSHSA3uPaSyzPvsRv","link":"https://research.google.com/seedbank/seed/lab__loading_and_understanding_your_data","linkText":"View on Colab","description":"Use Pandas to load and explore the raw data and put together all the pieces needed to train a linear regression model in TensorFlow.","challenges":[{"name":"Create a scatter plot for new features","points":1,"passingCriteria":"accuracy","passingThreshold":99,"truth":[1,2,3,4]},{"name":"Explain what you see ","points":1,"passingCriteria":"f1","passingThreshold":90,"truth":[1,0,1,0]},{"name":"Options to handle missing data","points":1,"passingCriteria":"precision","passingThreshold":95,"truth":[1,0,1,0]},{"name":"Build a Linear Regression Model","points":1,"passingCriteria":"MAP","passingThreshold":80,"truth":[1,0,1,0]}]}]}
